All alternation rests on their shoulders. #NSRouen
I wanted unity because what brings us together is so much more important than what can divide us, the stakes are so much stronger.

We congratulate the President of the UAE, the rulers of the Emirates and the Crown Prince and our faithful people on the 44th anniversary of the establishment of our union ... and the beginning of our journey ... unite our hearts and build our nation.

We remember Zayed, Rashid and their brothers every day, and these days history stands for them with pride and respect for their patience and will, which has created a state and a glorious daughter and has given us pride

The new year of our union will be a year of good and blessing, achievement and work, renewal of the Covenant and the promise of our people to make precious to ensure their happiness and achieve their aspirations
We also promise the President of the State to work on the implementation of the National Ten Points Program which he presented to the citizens today. All working teams prepare for a new federal year
